options.content: **WAN Standard:** *Standard WAN metrics included in Hazelcast.* **WAN Discovery Plugin:** *WAN plugin by Sorint.lab (reduces WAN endpoint discovery latency by 1000x)*

panels.description: Number of live endpoints performing WAN replication
panels.title: WAN Discovery: Live Endpoints

panels.description: Number of dead target endpoints that are not participating in WAN replication. As these endpoints become reachable, they are automatically moved to the live endpoint list.

panels.description: Total number of target endpoints configured for WAN replication
